name: Slack Outbound Connector
description: Create a channel or send a message to a channel or user

properties.label: Message block
properties.description: An array of rich message content blocks. Learn more at the official Slack documentation page

properties.label: attachments
properties.description: Camunda documents can be added as attachments

pattern.message: May contain up to 80 lowercase letters, digits, underscores, and dashes
May contain up to 80 lowercase letters, digits, underscores, and dashes
May contain up to 80 lowercase letters, digits, underscores, and dashes

properties.label: Users
properties.description: Comma-separated list of users, e.g., '@user1,@user2' or '=[ "@user1", "user2@company.com"]'

properties.label: Result variable
properties.description: Name of variable to store the response in

properties.label: Result expression
properties.description: Expression to map the response into process variables

properties.label: Error expression
properties.description: Expression to handle errors. Details in the documentation.

properties.label: Retries
properties.description: Number of retries

properties.label: Retry backoff
properties.description: ISO-8601 duration to wait between retries
